name: 段裘慶
objective:
1. 專題報告
2. 研究小組討論
schedule: 依排定週次輪替報告研究進度。
scorePolicy:
1. Group Meeting (30%): Presentation on master's research issue (10-15 min.) with a 20-page power-point file.
2. One-page Report (30%):  One report for each week.
3. Case Study (30%): A two-column report on a specified topic (6-8 pages).
4. Attendance (10%).
